# Discerning Senses
## Overview
You are highly attuned to the little tells of other creatures.

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *[[Vestraadi]]*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks against all creatures you have "charged" with your sonar.
- Your ***Poison Detector*** ability now also detects diseases.
